projects.title: Identifying Fake News in Filipino Articles with Recurrent Neural Networks
projects.description:
Investigated recurrent neural networks as a smaller alternative to transfer learning models for easier deployment of fake news classifiers in the Filipino language.

Submitted in fulfillment of the requirement in CMSC 190 Special Problems. It was also nominated for Best Research under the Computer Science Category as part of the 3rd ICS Undergraduate Research Symposium.

projects.title: Hotdog: A LOLCODE Interpreter
projects.description: A collaboratory project in CMSC 124 Design and Implementation of Programming Languages where I developed the lexer, parser, and semantiker for the interpreter.
